code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{CartContext}from"./CartContext";import"../css/Cart.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Cart=()=>{const{cart,removeFromCart,incrementQuantity,decrementQuantity}=useContext(CartContext);const calculateTotal=cart=>{return cart.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+item.price*item.quantity,0).toFixed(2);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-container",children:cart.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[cart.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.title,style:{width:'100px',height:'100px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",item.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>decrementQuantity(item.id),children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Quantity: ",item.quantity]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>incrementQuantity(item.id),children:"+"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>removeFromCart(item.id),children:"remove"})})]},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Total: $",calculateTotal(cart)]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Your cart is empty."})})]});};export default Cart;
